name: Special OPS Sniper Assassin
description:
Take aim at the right time and shoot the enemy! Special OPS Sniper Assassin is one of the shooting game that will give you the chance to increase your skills! The deadliest shooter in every perception, Special OPS Sniper Assassin takes you on a tour of the dark crime world. You will depending on your sharpshooting skills to finish the challenging levels. Go and get the accurate headshots now!
This game has ultra HD graphics, Realistic sound effects, smooth aiming controls and challenging multi-levels.
